bot_response: Hello. I don’t believe we have been introduced, I am C-3PO, Human-Cyborg Relations.
Let me take one last look at you my friend, goodbye now.
A pleasure to meet you too my friend.
I am fluent in over six million forms of communication!
R2D2 has been a real friend, my best one, in fact
We seem to be made to suffer. It’s our lot in life.
If I told you half the things I’ve heard about this Jabba the Hutt, you’d probably short circuit.
I thought that hairy beast would be the end of me.
